txt.en: Talk to Molkha in the valley

'Did you end the unhappy servitude of those long-dead dwarves? We may not be able to give them a proper burial, but we have done what we can. At least they are no longer the slaves of the Frost-horde.\n\n'Thank you for this, [placeholder].'
The Angmarim have given dwarf-wights to the drakes in Welkin-lofts.\n\nYou should defeat dwarf-wights in Flogalith.

'The Angmarim have gifted a number of dwarf-wights to the drakes of Flogalith, and these unhappy creatures now serve as nest-guardians. If you find yourself at Flogalith you must slay the wights! We cannot allow this insult to stand! It is the least we can do to honour these dwarves, though they perished long ago.'
You have slain many wights guarding the drake-nest. You should report your success to Molkha.\n\nMolkha can be found on the frozen lake south-west of Fellg√°t.
The Angmarim have gifted the Frost-horde with a number of dwarf-wights to act as guardians of their nests in Flogalith.
